column2: What is a strophic song?

column2: What is a through-composed song?

column4: Each stanza is set to the same music
column6: A very thoroughly composed piece of music

column2: What is a semi-strophic song?

column5: A song with motifs and ideas that seem to match each other but are not the same
column6: A song with a repetitive melody that sometimes introduces new ideas
column7: A song that has verses that are the same as each other

column2: Where would the music be the same usually in a semi-strophic song?

column6: At the beginning of the first stanza and the end of the second stanza
column7: At the end of the first stanza and the beginning of the second stanza
